extendedInfo.description: Rusted Warfare is an Android RTS inspired by classic real-time strategy games such as Total Annihilation and Command and Conquer.*Note this game is still in alpha and is still being developed. A better multiplayer interface, and more missions, levels and units, etc will be coming out soon*Features:-Both campaign and skirmish missions, with full AI-Land, air, and sea units-Unit pathfinding and formations-Fast interface: Issue commands through the minimap, multi-touch support, unit groups, rally points-Strategic zoom feature: Zoom out to view and issue commands across the whole battlefield-Multiplayer over Wifi and Internet-Survival mode (similar to tower defence)-Support for saving and loading of games (including multiplayer games)-Create and load your own custom levels, see forums for details-Full screen tablet support-Install To SD supportedPlay on the go against your friends on your phone or tablet. twitter: http://twitter.com/corrodinggamesforums: http://corrodinggames.com/forumsEmail me/twitter/post if you have any problems, or feature requests.

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Nice game, but for some reason the latest update won\'t install to my USB or SD card - hardly surprising since I\'m on a Nexus 7 which has neither :( Please fix for the 5th star :)
reviews.author: Andrew Small

reviews.title: In-game Menu a little too zoomed in?
reviews.comment: Im using the galaxy s4 and ive noticed that the menu on the right side towards the bottom where the numbers 1,2,3 are displayed are cut off only showing half, some kind of bug or is it just me, pls fix
reviews.author: Randy Molina

reviews.title: D54
reviews.comment: Looks very good, plays very well.  Buy it, well worth it.  Hope it\'s fully supported as they\'re onto a winner here.  Really, more people should own this...  83/100 (more units, maps and the like, and score will keep on rising!!!).  Is there any chance of getting multiplayer on this (unless you already have it, and I\'ve just missed it).  Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Friendly AI needs to shoot back when shot at. Builders need to auto repair. Buttons need to be 2x bigger. Maps need cliffs. Heavy Hover Tanks are OP with no cliffs. Put in a map editor and we\'re almost back to the good old days.
reviews.author: Nate Ribbens

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: I have been trying so hard to find a rts on android worth playing and this exceeds my expectations! I like how easy it handles once you grasp the controls. Feels just like C&C or total annihilation [both of which i play on PC still] i realize it is a work in progress, but the 2.99 was well worth the replay value. More units and maps pleeeease! Only real complaint
reviews.author: Derrick Jernstad

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Just downloaded the lastest version and the graphics are much better. The new units are awesome. Would like to see some mountains as impassable terain. Like more maps in the app too
reviews.author: Lee Weaver

reviews.title: Great game for Beta
reviews.comment: Has lots of potential. I can\'t wait to see the final product. Wish there was a pinch to zoom feature, but that might effect the selection tool. Would like to see more config options in settings like pinch to zoom. Would LOVE to learn how to make my own maps. And would LOVE to set the enemies personality to defense or offense. Or maybe not have the AI attack unless provoked. Just some thoughts. Keep up the great work developer.
reviews.author: Michael Mercado

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: I\'m still getting used to the interface and most things seem to work pretty well. Love the game dynamics so far. I just ran into a bug with level 3 where I completely controlled the map but never got credit for the victory. Would like to see an exit/quit to menu button. Using the back button to exit a game is a little confusing. This might be one of the best RTS for android.
reviews.author: Rafael Robayna

reviews.title: Good. Well made
reviews.comment: Pretty good RTS game, i just wish there were a few more minor controls such as clicking on the minimap to scroll over, and better grouping. As of now i cant seem to delete a group or take units out of one. But overall fun and i guess worth the money
reviews.author: Nico Nall

reviews.title: Old school - fun gameplay included!
reviews.comment: Its good to see a programmer just out to make games that people enjoy. No annoying ads, no bloody payments inside the game itself. Just a one off fee and a classic and FUN game. You just don\'t see this anymore!  With a decent multiplayer interface and a chatroom to meet other RTS fans, this game could be better than the likes of \"Great Big War Game\" and bring in the fees too. I\'d gladly pay a few pounds for a decent multiplayer RTS without all the ad crap or in game expenses..  Good work Corroding Games!
reviews.author: Adam Hosier

reviews.title: Awesome and addicted
reviews.comment: Was looking for command and conquer style game... tried this and its perfect. .. build base ... awesome defencive units and AI also good as it competitive level go from very easy to hard...ive now completed all maps so please add more maps thank you
reviews.author: Nimesh Patel

reviews.title: Kyocera Rise
reviews.comment: Anyone who says that there are no \"real\" games on the android platform have clearly never played Rusted Warfare.  This game is simply amazing it really takes me back to the old C&C days with a modern twist. Absolutely worth the money I actually started out playing the demo then got hooked so I finally bought the full game and I have not been disappointed the frame rate even with a massive cluster of enemies always stays above 30fps which is great nice and smooth their aren\'t many multiplayer matches
reviews.author: Jake Hughes

reviews.title: Easily best RTS on market and it\'s still alpha
reviews.comment: I am really surprised to know that this game is still in alpha, can\'t wait for final version. This is by far the best RTS on mobile. Great strategy, wonderful AI of enemy, as well as the AI of how your units move. Actually requires thought, can\'t just A-move into enemy base and win. Wonderfully done, keep going!
reviews.author: Gene Tosmuk

reviews.title: Great Blast
reviews.comment: For those who remember the days of AOE 1 & 2, the C&C franchise and the original Warcraft. This is a great blast from the past. Bought it purely so the developers continue with this addictive game.
reviews.author: Adam McCallum

reviews.title: I hope there\'s rusted warfare 2
reviews.comment: Its fun new experimental and mammoth tank. I hope there\'s rusted warfare 2 soon with new tank-hover tank and more like experimental-hover tank and an expanded builder and a new feature so you can build an hq Corning games will have this new version in the future I\'ll put that though in a time capsule.
reviews.author: Mary Crosby-Roth

reviews.title: Keeps crashing s3
reviews.comment: When working this game is great but it constantly crashes during levels. I have to keep manually saving just to be able to complete levels. If i forget I loose all progress as it seems to start another game after a crash so can\'t even open the last played game.
reviews.author: Chris Nichol

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: So good, probably spent way too long on this, crash\'s when I try to play multi player and I still have no idea how to create my own map, but its on par with my favourite android game minecrraft. Only wish now that the computer would build boats, for some reason they never do and I want a big naval battle
reviews.author: dave coggan

reviews.title: Very addictive
reviews.comment: I had to take all the games of my previous phone due to lack of space.  Now that we have a tablet my daughter insisted that this game and minecraft go onto it.  Now I don\'t see my tablet so often.  Very playable but still challenging.
reviews.author: John Pini

reviews.title: Just Awesome!
reviews.comment: This Is Great! Keep Up the development and this will go far! It has great potential. Fix up the multiplayer a bit please :) even though I\'m pretty sure you\'re working on it now. Recommended download!
reviews.author: Cameron Ferguson

reviews.title: Great game, thanks for making it!
reviews.comment: Five stars
reviews.author: Dave Assad
